action.progress: Page loaded with existing widgets visible. Need to open text input to submit query.

action.progress: Text input overlay opened successfully. Can see input field with placeholder 'Ask anything...' and Send button.
action.expectedSignal: Query should be typed into the input field
action.reasoning: Typing the KPI metrics query into the text input field

action.progress: Query typed successfully into input field. Now need to submit it.
action.expectedSignal: Text input overlay should close and KPI widgets should appear in the grid
action.reasoning: Pressing Enter to submit the query and trigger widget rendering

action.progress: Submitted query with Enter but text input overlay is still open. No KPI widgets appeared yet.
action.blocker: Input overlay didn't close after Enter - may need to click Send button instead
action.expectedSignal: Text input overlay closes and KPI widget cards appear in the grid
action.reasoning: Enter key didn't work to submit. As a normal user, I'll click the Send button to submit the query instead

error:
locator.click: Timeout 15000ms exceeded.
Call log:
  - waiting for getByRole('button', { name: 'Send' }).first()

action.progress: KPI widgets are already visible on screen with numeric values: Grid Voltage (238.4 V), Total Power (1247 kW), Equipment Online (12), Active Alerts (3). The query was successfully processed.
action.expectedSignal: Task complete - KPI metric widgets are rendered and visible
action.reasoning: The task is complete. After submitting the query 'Show key metrics overview', KPI-type widgets appeared in the grid layout showing numeric metrics. The text input overlay closed automatically after submission, which is the expected behavior. I can clearly see 4 KPI widgets with their values displayed.
